mapper.select:
select sol.id, sol.operation_title, sol.operation_type, sol.request_ip, sol.domain, sol.request_uri, sol.request_method, sol.request_params, sol.execution_time, sol.is_deleted, sol.created_by, sol.created_time, sol.modified_by, sol.modified_time from sys_operation_log sol
sol.is_deleted = 0
and sol.operation_title like concat('%',#{dto.operationTitle},'%')
and sol.request_params like concat('%',#{dto.requestParams},'%')
and sol.created_time >= #{dto.startTime}
and sol.created_time <= #{dto.endTime}
order by sol.created_time desc
